name: node-java-rt
description:
Node.js API and bindings supporting java.lang and java.util. 
 * (partial) support for java.lang based on node-java 
 * (partial) support for java.util based on node-java.  
 * Basic abstraction on top of node-java 
 * typings for node-java 
 * Projects like node-lucene are based on this.

scripts.test-js: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/spec
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebastian Gurin
